snippet: Turkey said on Saturday it would keep holding rallies in Germany and the Netherlands to urge Turks living there to back a vote to boost President Tayyip Erdogan's powers, despite opposition from authorities in both countries....

headline.main: Maine's Biggest Dog Sled Race Celebrates 25th Anniversary
headline.print_headline: Maine's Biggest Dog Sled Race Celebrates 25th Anniversary

lead_paragraph: Turkey said on Saturday it would keep holding rallies in Germany and the Netherlands to urge Turks living there to back a vote to boost President Tayyip Erdogan's powers, despite opposition from authorities in both countries.
